story.title: Our story
story.content:
Founded in 2020 by sustainable construction enthusiasts, Oveco was born from a simple observation: too many ecological housing projects remain inaccessible to individuals. We decided to change this by offering personalized support and practical training.

Since our beginnings, we have supported more than 50 families in their self-build and ecological renovation projects. Each project is unique, and it is this diversity that enriches us and pushes us to always innovate.
